resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82211</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82211</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4751</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Describing Themes/ Bach Cantata BWV 78</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción de temas/ Cantata BWV 78 de Bach</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur Síos/ Bach Cantata BWV 78</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreiben Der Themen Bach Kantate BWV 78</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrire La Cantate BWV 78 De Bach de Thèmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrevendo O Cantata BWV 78 De Bach Dos Temas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione Del Cantata BWV 78 Di Bach Di Temi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή θέματα/Bach της καντάτας BWV 78</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an exercise in describing themes. You are encouraged to describe a theme by referring to its musical qualities rather than to alphabetical labels.</string>
            <string language="es">Este es un ejercicio para describir temas. Se anima a describir un tema refiriéndose a sus cualidades musicales más que a etiquetas alfabéticas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is ceacht i gcur síos ar théamaí é seo. Spreagtar tú cur síos a dhéanamh ar théama trí tagairt a dhéanamh dá cháilíochtaí ceoil seachas lipéid aibítreach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Übung, wenn es Themen 
beschreibt. Sie werden angeregt, ein Thema zu beschreiben, indem
man seine musikalischen Qualitäten anstatt zu den alphabetischen 
Kennsätzen anspricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice en décrivant des thèmes. 
Vous êtes encouragé à décrire un thème en se rapportant à 
ses qualités musicales plutôt qu'aux étiquettes alphabétiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um exercício em descrever temas. 
Você é incentivado descrever um tema consultando a suas 
qualidades musicais melhor que às etiquetas alfabéticas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'esercitazione nella descrizione dei 
temi. Siete consigliati a descrivere un tema riferendosi alle 
relative qualità musicali piuttosto che alle etichette alfabetiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια άσκηση στην περιγραφή των θεμάτων. 
Ενθαρρύνεστε για να περιγράψετε ένα θέμα με την αναφορά 
στις μουσικές ιδιότητές της παρά στις αλφαβητικές ετικέτες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
